original_text: Each of these towns had its own fields round it, for animals to eat the grass.
korean_text: 이 각 성읍의 주위에 목초지가 있었고 모든 성읍이 다 그러하였더라

sentences.original_text: Each of these towns had its own fields
sentences.korean_translation: 이 성읍들 각각에는 자기들의 들이 있었고

sentences.original_text: for animals to eat the grass
